summary: Improves and expands the Dragonborn settlement
descriptionHtml:
[IMG]http://i43.photobucket.com/albums/e367/princess_stomper/Misc/RRtitle_zpscadf451f.jpg[/IMG]

*****************************

[b]Requires: Dragonborn DLC[/b]

[b] 1. Description[/b]

*****************************

Expands and improves the settlement at Raven Rock:

* TWO new player homes:

**One well cluttered, looks "lived in"
**One sparsely furnished for you to decorate yourself
Both are free to own and have plenty of storage, enchanting/alchemy stations, etc.

* New camp area in grounds of demolished house

* Improvements to buyable house, including new bathroom

* Improvements to tavern, with new NPCs and furniture

* New underground manor district: "Raven Rock Under-Skar" with NPC housing, shops, library, public garden, theatre and baths


*****************************

[b] 3. Installation[/b]

*****************************

To install the plugin, unzip the files into the "Steam/steamapps/common/Skyrim/Data" directory.

The extra textures folder (in the download file at Nexus) is an "insurance" because the facegen TGA files wouldn't pack properly (the dds files are in the main BSA archive).

*****************************

[b] 4. Playing the plugin[/b]

*****************************

From the Skyrim Launcher, select Data Files and check the box next to the Better Raven Rock.esp file.

*****************************

[b] 5. Version History[/b]

*****************************

*V1.0 - Original Release.

*****************************

[b] 6. Compatibilty[/b]

*****************************

This plugin may conflict with other mods that modify Raven Rock.

*****************************

[b] 7. Credits[/b]

*****************************

Insanity - bath tub, lanterns, mortar & pestle, soap, brush, paintings, cotton spools, towels,
Lilith/Insanity - filled shelves, washbasins
Runscorn - toilet

*****************************

[b] 8. Usage[/b]

*****************************

**Please email me with any bugs. Feel free to modify and/or distribute this mod, but please give credit.
author: Princess Stomper
